name: RIBBEAT!
description:
RIBBEAT!

A local 2-player game about frogs wearing capes punching each other.

Made for Ludum Dare 37.

GAMEPAD CONTROLS (Recommended)

Left Stick – Move

A – Jump

X – Attack

RT – Dash

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Player 1:

WASD – Move

F – Jump

G – Attack

H – Dash

Player 2:

Arrow Keys – Move

U – Jump

I – Attack

O – Dash
